title: Online ESL tutor
job_overview:
We are seeking an experienced and passionate online ESL tutor to work with teenage students at a beginner English level. The primary goal is to help them build confidence and fluency in conversational English for everyday situations.

Responsibilities:

Conduct engaging, interactive online lessons focused on real-life communication

Create beginner-friendly lesson plans tailored for teenagers

Use diverse teaching methods to encourage active student participation

Provide clear, constructive feedback to help students improve gradually

Qualifications:

Proven experience teaching English as a Second Language (ESL)

Strong understanding of language development for beginner learners

Ability to build rapport with teenagers and create a fun learning environment

Excellent communication skills and patience

Working Hours:

Korea Standard Time (KST): 2:00 PM – 9:00 PM, Monday to Friday

Compensation:

First 3 months (probationary period): $175 USD/month

After 3 months: $350 USD/month

Additional Requirements (Apostille Documents Required):
To be considered for this role, candidates must be able to provide apostilled copies of the following documents:

A 2-year or 4-year college/university diploma

A valid passport

A criminal background check issued within the last 6 months

A medical certificate (issued within the last month) confirming no drug use

Note:
Further details regarding compensation or support for apostille-related documents will be discussed individually.

If you're passionate about helping students gain confidence in English and meet the above criteria, we’d love to hear from you!
